PROJECTS

Live Websites | Open Source

Live Websites

veritas.art

Business website and shop for a national renowned art auction house.

  • Auctions timeline
  • Lots list and filtering
  • User login, registration and profile
  • Bidding orders and shopping cart


Link: https://veritas.art

brief.pt

Company website for a digital and creative agency

  • Reusable modules across pages
  • Projects showcase and navigation
  • Job postings
  • Made with Wordpress, using TimberSage


Link: https://brief.pt

luism-s.github.io

This website

  • Presentation, projects and curriculum listing
  • All style measures are powers of 2 (1, 2, 4, 8, 16 … 1024)
  • Made with Jekyll and published on Github

Open Source

slim-3-multilingual

Extension to the Slim PHP micro-framework version 3, to enable language based routing, i.e. i18n and l10n.

Github
Packagist

myboilerplate

Front-end boilerplate with basic the tools needed to start the development of simple web pages/apps.

Github

TimberSage

Adaptation of Sage 8.5.4 Wordpress starter theme, with the adition of Timber for painless development. Developed for internal use @ Brief Creatives

Github

Gettext parser for Twig in Wordpress development

Parser of Twig files to find gettext function calls (e.g. __(), __n, _x(), etc) to output a POT file for translation.

Context: github.com/timber/timber/issues/1465, github.com/timber/timber/pull/1711

Github

Github Contributions
  • Replace Twig_SimpleFunction and Twig_Function with Timber_Function by extending both classes depending on Twig version
  • Enable Post::convert() to convert also single WP_Posts
Jan. 2018, Luís Silva
